alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 3:48AM EDT until October 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.9 to 5.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/05 PM 4.0/ 4.5 0.4/ 0.9 0.4/ 0.9 4-5 None 02/06 AM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.5/ 1.0 6-7 None 02/06 PM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 1.0/ 1.5 8-9 Minor 03/07 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.2/ 0.7 1.1/ 1.6 9 None 03/07 PM 4.2/ 4.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 8-9 None 04/08 AM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.5/ 1.0 8 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
